hackathon-description-text: Bring your creativity, curiosity and passion to Ventura County's first hackathon. A hackathon is a coding event in which teams "hack" together to create an awesome project like a game, website, or app. Team up with some of the brightest minds in Ventura County to turn energy and free food into awesome prize-winning projects!
hackathon-eligibility: You must be a student participating in the VCOE Hackathon by the Sea.
hackathon-requirements: Hacks can be software, hardware, or a combination of both.
hackathon-rules: Please follow the Code of Conduct for the event: https://hackcodeofconduct.org/539-hackathon_by_the_sea.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winners will receive an echo dot.
Winners will receive a Roku Express.
Winners will receive a bluetooth smart watch.
Winners will receive a Roku Express.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=5100 Adolfo Rd, Camarillo, CA 93012, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is this idea innovative? Is it impactful? Is it inspiring? Is it creative?
Is this project functional? Did the demo support the idea? Does the final project convey the vision? How much effort was put into this?
